#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
set<int> s;
pair<set<int>::iterator,bool> it;
inline int inp()
{
    int noRead=0;
    char p= getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;)
    {
     p=getchar_unlocked();
    };
    while(p>32)
    {
     noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
     p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
};
int main()
{
	int t,i,n,l,previous,max,count;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		//scanf("%d",&n);
		n=inp();
		previous=1;
			count=0;
			max=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			//scanf("%d",&l);
			
			l=inp();
			it=s.insert(l);
			if(it.second==false)
			{
				if(previous!=l)
				{
					count=0;
					previous=l;
				}
				count++;
				if(count>max)
				max=count;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",max);
		s.clear();
	}	
}
